meditation.speaker: Narrator
meditation.text: Mother leads you to a hidden garden behind the cafe - a place overgrown and forgotten. At its center, an ancient stone circle.

mother_explains.speaker: Mother
mother_explains.text: This is where Elara and her dragon would come to deepen their bond. The stones still hold that ancient magic.

dragon_excited.speaker: Narrator
dragon_excited.text: Your dragon moves to the center of the circle with purpose, settling down and looking at you expectantly.

mother_instructs.speaker: Mother
mother_instructs.text: Sit with your dragon. Close your eyes. Feel the connection you've built over all these months. It's time to understand what it truly means.

player_sits.speaker: Narrator
player_sits.text: You settle beside your dragon. The moment you close your eyes, warmth spreads through you - and then something extraordinary happens.

vision_begins.speaker: Narrator
vision_begins.text: You see through your dragon's eyes. You feel what it feels. A flood of memories - not just yours, but generations of bonded pairs before you.

vision_elara.speaker: Narrator
vision_elara.text: You see Elara, young and fierce, tending to a wounded dragon. You feel the gratitude, the trust, the love that sparked a legacy.

vision_generations.speaker: Narrator
vision_generations.text: Generation after generation flashes before you. Some bonds strong, some faint. All of them leading to this moment - to you.

dragon_speaks.speaker: Narrator
dragon_speaks.text: And then, for the first time, you hear your dragon's voice - not in words, but in pure feeling. It speaks of waiting, of hope, of finally being complete.

bond_deepens.speaker: Narrator
bond_deepens.text: You reach back with everything you have. The love you've built. The adventures you've shared. The future you want to create together.

bond_complete.speaker: Narrator
bond_complete.text: The connection solidifies into something unbreakable. You are two hearts, one purpose. Dragon and bonded, as it was always meant to be.

mother_tears.speaker: Mother
mother_tears.text: *Through tears* I can see it... the bond is complete. You're truly one of Elara's children now.

dragon_rumbles.speaker: Narrator
dragon_rumbles.text: Your dragon rumbles with contentment, and you feel it echo in your own chest. This is what you were born for.

end_scene.speaker: Mother
end_scene.text: You've unlocked an ancient recipe - the Ancestral Blessing. It was Elara's gift to her dragon. Now it belongs to you.
